title: I cannot connect my Laptop to my Work VPN Server using Pixel Hotspot/tethering
content:
I can connect to the internet using the Pixel 3's Hotspot - use browser on my work laptop.
However, when I try to use to my Work VPN through the Pixel 3's hotspot connection cannot be established.

I used the SIM card in the Pixel and put it in my ASUS Zenphone 2 and used it's hotspot - IT WORKED.
I used the SIM card and put it in my Mobile WiFi device - IT WORKED.
So, my Network is not at fault - Vodafone - as it works on two other devices.
My Laptop VPN is not at fault - because it works on two other devices.

I don't understand why with Pixel 3 hotspot VPN connection from my laptop is not working.

Do I now need to sell my Pixel 3?  Help Please
